amathi rajitha hambanthota giwisuma hora giwisumak nowe - sabhawata idiripath kala wita wada kirimata hakiyawa thibenawa ranminithanna wikinime thiranayak naha- janamadhya amathi kagalle welandun 930k nithiye hamuwatathirasara sanwardhanaya pilibanda jathika prathipaththiyak ha upaya margayak sanwardhanaya kirima saha kriyathmaka kirima - panath ketumpathak parlimenthuwatapa‡∑äradhana sanghanayaka pujya walmille somananda himige aadahana pujothsawaya adamawanalla pirisidu karanna japanayen awithmathara disthrikkaye sanwardhanaya wenuwen sawoma ekwa katayuthu kala yuthuyiusas pela wishishtayo diwayine sathara desin 2017 warshaye mathara disthrik prathama krushikarma kamitu raswima adawiyali muhudu kudallan saha mora waral thogayak samanga pudgalayan dedeneku nawika hamuda athadanguwatadilindukama pitudakime kagalla salasma sakachcha kereshri lanka - china sanwardhana kalapa wyapruthiye pradhana aramuna rakiya uthpadanayayi - amathya sajith premadasajanathawata sewaya kirima rajya sewakayage parama yuthukamayithirasara yugayaka thewasara arambauma jathika uthsawaya hetahambanthota waraya saha karmanthapuraya pilibandawa gena yana pa‡∑ärachara asathya bawa janapathi pawasayi ada sita rudhira parikshana paudgalika anshayen thahanamlotharayi alewi niyojithayin janapathi hamu weyidilindukama thuran kirime abhiyogaya jaya gatha yuthuyijayagrahana rasak samanga aarthika sanwardhana adithalamak sakas kala - agamathichakralekha ullanghanaya karana rohal adhyakshawarun gana saukhya amathyawarayata warthawak thriwidha hamudawe podusama kalaya adin awasanaabadhitha nawika pudgalayan wenuwen poli rahitha laksha 5 naya mudal pradanaya kere hitapu agramathya rathnasiri wikramanayaka mahathage awasan katayuthu ada"aktiw shri lanka" oostreliya sahayogitha malala krida puhunu kandawura - dewana wadamuluwa ada janamadhya ayithin ha pramithin sandaha adahas ha yojana laba ganime kalaya dirgha kerehambanthota aayojakayange labhayen 20%k saha badu mudal shri lanka rajayatakagalla disthrik lekam karyalayen rasawindanathmaka wadasatahanakpasugiya wasare samudriya aarakshaka rajakariyen nawika hamudawa ta koti 226ka aadayamak wokswagan karmantha shalawata janapathi athin mulgal thabe saukhya amathyanshayen sathutu gammana wyapruthiyakkrida puhunukaruwan puhunu kirime wadamuluwak gampahadipadawiya pradeshayata thawath prathi aashratha jala piripahadu yanthrayakhitapu agamathi rathnasiri wika‡∑äramanayaka mahathage awasan katayuthu purna rajya anuga‡∑ärahayen ‚Äì janapathigen upades wishalatha ma aayojana wyapruthiyak wana wokswagan karmantha shalawata ada mulgal thabeyi‚Äúthirasara yugayak‚Äù sandaha rajaye dakma elidakwejathika surakshithatha dinaya wenuwen gampahadi samarum uthsawayakyahapath samajayak godanagimata nithiya thulin pamanak nohaki athara eeta pa‡∑ärabalama shakthiya bauddha darshanaya bawa janapathi pawasayikagalle aapadawanta lakwuwanta rathu kurusen jiwanopaya sanwardhana wadasatahanakthangalla nawa nagara sanwardhanayata chinayen aadhara mathara disthrikkaye sulu parimana wishishta wyawasayakayinta sammanahemmathagama rohale adu padu soya balewishala parimanaye aayojana dekak sandaha heta mul gal thabesiyallan samanga sahajiwanayen diwi gewimata aditan kara ganimu -
